Attribute.name: InverseGhostZoneAttributes
Attribute.purpose: This class contains attributes for the inverse ghost zone operator.

Field.name: showDuplicated
Field.label: Show Zones That Are Duplicated At Domain Boundaries

Field.name: showAMRRefined
Field.label: Show zones refined out by finer patches (AMR)

Field.name: showExterior
Field.label: Show cells on exterior of data set

Field.name: showNotApplicable
Field.label: Show zones deemed not applicable to problem
